Monitoringdesc: Purpose of the monitoring system: Continuous monitoring of the condition of bridge-like structures, Early detection of potential risks, Long-term data storage, Extending the service life of structures, Minimizing labor force, Integration with the E-bridge platform

gpsDsc: Strengthening the control of special equipment belonging to society and system organizations. Preventing the use of equipment beyond the specified workload. Information on the proper condition of equipment. Remote control capabilities for equipment. Integration with the E-bridge platform.
omborDesc: Electronic control of the consumption of construction materials stored in the warehouses of society and system organizations. Prevent unauthorized consumption of products. Stay constantly informed about remaining products in warehouses. Integration with 1C accounting software. Integration with the E-bridge platform
archiveDesc: The ability to store archival data related to the organization's activities for a long time., Ensuring a high level of archival data security., Easy search of archival data., Constant statistical information based on archived data., Integration with the E-bridge platform.
